discover.instruction: Read this research summary. Notice how claims are softened.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай это резюме исследования. Обрати внимание, как смягчаются утверждения.

content.text: The results <highlight>suggest</highlight> that exercise <highlight>may</highlight> improve cognitive function. <highlight>It appears</highlight> that regular activity <highlight>could</highlight> reduce decline. <highlight>To some extent</highlight>, lifestyle factors <highlight>seem to</highlight> play a role. <highlight>It is possible that</highlight> diet <highlight>might</highlight> also contribute. The evidence <highlight>tends to indicate</highlight> positive effects. <highlight>In general</highlight>, findings <highlight>appear to</highlight> support the hypothesis. <highlight>It would seem</highlight> that prevention is <highlight>relatively</highlight> effective. <highlight>One possible explanation</highlight> is improved blood flow. Results are <highlight>somewhat</highlight> promising, though <highlight>tentative</highlight>.
content.question: Why don't researchers make definite claims?
content.question_ru: Почему исследователи не делают определённых утверждений?

theory.title: Hedging in Academic and Professional Discourse
theory.title_ru: Хеджирование в академическом и профессиональном дискурсе

points.rule: Modal verbs: may, might, could, would (for possibility/probability)
points.rule_ru: Модальные глаголы: may, might, could, would (для возможности/вероятности)
points.example: This could explain the results. It may be significant.

points.rule: Hedging verbs: suggest, indicate, appear, seem, tend to
points.rule_ru: Глаголы хеджирования: suggest, indicate, appear, seem, tend to
points.example: The data suggest... It appears that... Results tend to show...

points.rule: Adverbs of probability: probably, possibly, perhaps, apparently
points.rule_ru: Наречия вероятности: probably, possibly, perhaps, apparently
points.example: This is probably true. Perhaps more research is needed.

points.rule: Qualifying phrases: to some extent, in general, on the whole
points.rule_ru: Оговаривающие фразы: to some extent, in general, on the whole
points.example: To some extent, this is valid. In general, results support...

points.rule: Impersonal constructions: It is possible that, It could be argued that
points.rule_ru: Безличные конструкции: It is possible that, It could be argued that
points.example: It is possible that factors were overlooked. It could be argued that...

comparison_table.hedged: X may cause Y / X appears to cause Y
This seems to be true / This appears to be the case
It is generally accepted / It would appear
The study tends to show / The study seems to indicate
It might be concluded / One possible conclusion is

tasks.text:
Research conclusions:

1. The findings suggest a possible link between stress and illness.
2. It would appear that early intervention could be beneficial.
3. There seems to be evidence supporting this hypothesis.
4. To some extent, the results are consistent with previous studies.
5. One possible explanation might be genetic factors.
6. The data tend to indicate a correlation.
7. Perhaps further research could clarify these issues.
8. It is likely that environmental factors play a role.
9. The evidence appears to support this interpretation.
10. In general, the outcomes were somewhat positive.

exercises.instruction: Choose the appropriate level of hedging for the context.

options: X might possibly perhaps cause Y
questions.explanation: Academic writing needs hedging but not excessive uncertainty
'May' is standard for medical warnings - clear but not absolute
'Suggest' allows for uncertainty in scientific claims

sentences.incorrect: The results definitely might prove the theory.
sentences.correct: The results seem to support the theory.

sentences.incorrect: It is absolutely possible that this is true.
sentences.correct: It is possible that this is true. / This is possibly true.

sentences.incorrect: Perhaps certainly this could maybe work.
sentences.correct: Perhaps this could work. / This might work.
sentences.explanation: Too many hedging devices creates confusion

produce.instruction: Write an academic paragraph using appropriate hedging.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши академический абзац, используя соответствующее хеджирование.
prompts: Discuss possible causes of a phenomenon
produce.example: The relationship between sleep and academic performance appears to be significant. Recent studies suggest that students who sleep fewer than seven hours may experience cognitive difficulties. It would seem that memory consolidation, which occurs during sleep, could be particularly important for learning. To some extent, the evidence tends to support the recommendation for adequate rest. However, it is possible that individual differences play a role. One possible explanation for varying results might be differences in sleep quality rather than quantity. In general, the findings appear to indicate that sleep should perhaps be considered an important factor in educational outcomes.
criteria: Appropriate balance (not too strong or too weak)

input_flood.description: Read 5 academic texts with appropriate hedging.

texts.title: Psychology Research
texts.content: The findings suggest that emotional intelligence may play a significant role in workplace success. It appears that individuals with higher EQ tend to perform better in team environments. To some extent, this could explain variation in leadership effectiveness. One possible interpretation is that self-awareness enables better interpersonal relationships. The evidence seems to indicate that EQ can be developed through training. It would appear that early intervention might be particularly beneficial. However, it is likely that other factors also contribute to professional outcomes.

texts.title: Environmental Science
texts.content: The data appear to support the hypothesis that urban green spaces may reduce stress levels. It seems that exposure to nature could have measurable psychological benefits. To some extent, this might explain the growing interest in biophilic design. The results tend to indicate that even brief contact with greenery appears beneficial. It is possible that evolutionary factors play a role. Perhaps future research could clarify the mechanisms involved. On the whole, the evidence suggests that urban planning should possibly incorporate more natural elements.

texts.title: Medical Study
texts.content: The treatment appears to be relatively effective for certain patient groups. Initial findings suggest that side effects may be minimal in most cases. It would seem that the drug could offer an alternative to current therapies. To some extent, individual responses tend to vary. One possible explanation might be genetic differences in metabolism. The evidence seems to indicate that longer trials could provide more conclusive data. It is likely that dosage adjustments may be necessary for optimal outcomes.

texts.title: Economic Analysis
texts.content: Current trends seem to suggest that inflation may stabilize by mid-year. It appears that supply chain improvements could contribute to price moderation. To some extent, consumer behavior tends to influence market dynamics. The data indicate that interest rate changes might have delayed effects. One possible interpretation is that the economy appears more resilient than previously thought. It would seem that a gradual recovery is likely. Perhaps further policy adjustments could accelerate improvement. In general, the outlook seems cautiously optimistic.

texts.title: Educational Research
texts.content: The study suggests that technology integration may enhance student engagement. It appears that interactive methods could improve retention to some extent. The results tend to indicate that blended learning might be effective for certain subjects. One possible explanation is that variety seems to maintain attention. It is possible that individual learning styles play a role. The evidence appears to support a balanced approach. Perhaps future research could identify optimal combinations. On the whole, findings seem promising though tentative.
